Text: The de Schelde Scheldemusch was a single-seat pusher biplane designed in the Netherlands to be easy and safe to fly.
Triplets:<The de Schelde Scheldemusch

Text: De Schelde Scheldemusch:  Despite a sales campaign in the UK, only six were built, one being briefly tested by the RAF.
Triplets:<De Schelde Scheldemusch
